attraction_reviewComments: We visited this miniature horse ranch and finally learn the difference between a Shetland pony and a miniature horse. These are small horses and have the temperament of a horse... read more
We didnt get to go in as it was a sunday, But stopped by to look at these minitaure lil horses grazing on the grass.
If you have kids - or you are a big kid at heart - do NOT miss the FREE opportunity to fawn over these tiny adorable horses! If you're a photographer, this is a great photo op... read more

Hardly anyone there when we arrived but nice to be able to walk the grounds. Saw a foal that was only 3 days old. A true highlight.
Love that you can just by and view the beautiful horses! The animals are stunning and live a great life :)
